trans: 3:疑惑的洞窟

text: Sig informs the crew that dead ends don't apply to Albacore, yet the cave path leads to a dead end with no signs of Albacore anywhere. However, Harjuna Cave is home to another monster.
trans: 团员们小心翼翼地穿过洞穴.一行人担心前方可能是死胡同,Sig神情严肃地告诉他们,星晶兽Albacore所到之处根本不存在死胡同.但是,姬塔她们被不应存在的死胡同挡住了去路,而且得知Harjuna洞窟是与星晶兽无关的魔物们的地盘.

name: Sig
text: How about it, Lyria? To my understanding, you're able to detect the presence of primal beasts.
trans: 怎么样?露莉亚.露莉亚你能感觉到星晶兽的气息对吧?

name: Sig
text: Do you sense it anywhere in this cave?
trans: 在这个洞窟深处,有星晶兽的气息吗?

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Hrm... I feel a faint hint of something, but I can't really tell...
trans: 嗯...目前看不出来.但好像有可疑的迹象...

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Hold that thought. Aren't we heading toward a dead end?
trans: 等下,前面不是死胡同吗?

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: If Albacore never stops moving on its migration, it would never swim into a dead end.
trans: 如果Albacore永远不会停止洄游,那就不会出现在死胡同里

name: Sig
text: There's no such thing as dead ends as far as that beast's concerned.
trans: 对它来说,没有死胡同这种东西...

name: Sig
text: Of course they tried using nets and cages to try to catch it many years ago.
trans: 好像好几代以前也有过用网和笼子捕捉它的事

name: Sig
text: Regardless of the material used or magic cast, that thing ripped right through them.
trans: 不管用什么材料制作的陷阱,施展什么魔法,据说都被破坏掉了.

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: I see. Then we'll have to continue to focus and keep our wits about us.
trans: 唔...这样啊.那么我们鼓起精神,继续前进.

name: Sig
text: Aye, proceed with caution. Albacore could come flying in at any moment!
trans: 嗯,小心点,谁知道Albacore会从哪里冒出来呢!

name: Sig
trans: 什么...死,死胡同?

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: I don't see any holes that Albacore could've squeezed through.
trans: 看来哪里都没有那个星晶兽钻过的洞啊...

name: Lyria/露莉亚
trans: 嗯...会不会是躲在什么地方了?

name: Walder
text: Surely these forest-trained eyes of mine would've spotted it in the dark by now...
trans: 不管躲在哪里,我这双在夜晚森林里锻炼出来的双眼眨眼间...

name: Vyrn/碧
trans: 喂,喂! 那个

name: Katalina/卡塔莉娜
text: Looks like we've wandered into some other monster's territory.
trans: 看来这里是无关魔物的地盘啊...

name: Sig
text: It doesn't look like it's going to let us leave either. Show no quarter, 姬塔!
trans: 话虽这么说,但现在可不是能让我平安回去的气氛啊.上吧!姬塔!
